languages.text: "Мы будем думать об огне и вере. О том, кого ты зовешь своим богом и Императором. Может, так мы поймем?"

traits.locale_text: "Я понял, что ты имеешь ввиду. Ты предполагаешь, что меня, возможно, надо уничтожить. Но это не так. Не надо мне вредить, пожалуйста".
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: "We will think about the flame and faith. About the one you call your god and Emperor. Perhaps we will understand then?"
languages.original_text: "Мы будем думать об огне и вере. О том, кого ты зовешь своим богом и Императором. Может, так мы поймем?"

traits.locale_text: "We will think about the flame and faith. On the one, you call your god and Emperor. Perhaps we will understand then?"
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

traits.locale_text: "We will think on the flame and faith. On the one you call your god and Emperor. Perhaps we will understand then?"
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

traits.locale_text: "We will think about the flame and faith. On the one, you call your god and Emperor. Perhaps we will understand then?"
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

traits.locale_text: "We will think about the flame and faith. On the one, you call your god and Emperor. Perhaps we will understand then?"
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

traits.locale_text: "We will think about the flame and faith. About the one you call your god and Emperor. Perhaps we will understand then?"
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

traits.locale_text: "We will think about the flame and faith. About the one you call your god and Emperor. Perhaps we will understand then?"
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: « Nous allons réfléchir à la flamme et à la foi, à celui que vous appelez votre Dieu et Empereur. Peut-être cela nous permettra-t-il de comprendre ? »
languages.original_text: "We will think about the flame and faith. About the one you call your god and Emperor. Perhaps we will understand then?"

traits.locale_text: « Nous allons réfléchir à la flamme et à la foi, à celui que vous appelez votre dieu et empereur. Peut-être cela nous permettra-t-il de comprendre ? »
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: “我们会好好思索火焰与信仰，还有那个被你称为‘神’与‘帝皇’的存在。或许我们以后会理解吧？”
languages.original_text: "We will think about the flame and faith. About the one you call your god and Emperor. Perhaps we will understand then?"

traits.locale_text: “我们会好好思索火焰与信仰，还有那个被你称为‘神’与‘帝皇’的存在。或许我们以后会理解吧？”
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: "Wir werden über die Flamme und den Glauben nachdenken. Über den, den Ihr Euren Gott und Imperator nennt. Vielleicht verstehen wir es dann?"
languages.original_text: "We will think about the flame and faith. About the one you call your god and Emperor. Perhaps we will understand then?"

traits.locale_text: "Wir werden über die Flamme und den Glauben nachdenken. Über den, den Ihr Euren Gott und Imperator nennt. Vielleicht verstehen wir es dann?"
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: «Pensaremos sobre la llama y la fe. Sobre el que llama dios y Emperador. Quizá así logremos entenderlo».
languages.original_text: "We will think about the flame and faith. About the one you call your god and Emperor. Perhaps we will understand then?"

traits.locale_text: «Pensaremos sobre la llama y la fe. Sobre el que llamas dios y Emperador. Quizá así logremos entenderlo».
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: 「私たちは炎と信仰について考える。あなたが神と皇帝と呼ぶものについて考える。そうすれば、いつかは理解できるだろうか？」
languages.original_text: "We will think about the flame and faith. About the one you call your god and Emperor. Perhaps we will understand then?"

traits.locale_text: 「私たちは炎と信仰について考える。あなたが神と皇帝と呼ぶものについて考える。そうすれば、いつかは理解できるだろうか？」
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: "Ateşi ve inancı düşüneceğiz. Tanrınız ve İmparator'unuz dediğiniz kişi hakkında düşüneceğiz. Belki o zaman anlarız."
languages.original_text: "We will think about the flame and faith. About the one you call your god and Emperor. Perhaps we will understand then?"

traits.locale_text: "Ateşi ve inancı düşüneceğiz. Tanrınız ve İmparator'unuz dediğiniz kişi hakkında düşüneceğiz. Belki o zaman anlarız."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos
